code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Calm
  Calm --> Aggressive: sees player (FOV + LOS)
  Aggressive --> Alerted: player not seen (start cooldown)
  Alerted --> Calm: cooldown elapsed
  Alerted --> Aggressive: player seen again

  note right of Aggressive
    NPCPathSystem chases player
    (repath interval)
  end note

  note right of Alerted
    NPCPathSystem goes to last seen position
  end note

  note right of Calm
    NPCPathSystem patrols between nodes
    random idle 3-5s
  end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
